replace ($)sections of a nonmem control stream

Source: R/NMwriteSection.R
NMwriteSection.Rd

Just give the section name, the new lines and the file path, and the "$section", and the input to Nonmem will be updated.

NMwriteSection(
  file,
  section,
  newlines,
  list.sections,
  newfile,
  backup = TRUE,
  blank.append = TRUE,
  write = TRUE
)

Arguments

file

File path to the model (control stream) to edit.

section

The name of the section to update. Example: section="EST" to edit the sections starting by $EST. See NMreadSection

newlines

The new text (including "$SECTION"). Better be broken into lines in a character vector since this is simply past to writeLines.

list.sections

Named list of new sections, each element containing a section. Names must be section names, contents of each element are the new section lines for each section.

newfile

path to new run. If missing, path is used. If NULL, output is returned rather than written.

backup

In case you are overwriting the old file, do you want to backup the file (to say, backup_run001.mod)?

blank.append

Append a blank line to output?

write

Default is to write to file. If write=FALSE, NMwriteSection returns the resulting input.txt without writing it. to disk? Default is FALSE.

Value

The new section text is returned. If write=TRUE, this is done invisibly.

Details

The new file will be written with unix-style line endings.

See also

Other Nonmem: NMapplyFilters(), NMextractText(), NMreadSection(), NMwriteData()

Examples

newlines <- "$EST POSTHOC INTERACTION METHOD=1 NOABORT PRINT=5 MAXEVAL=9999 SIG=3"
NMwriteSection(file=system.file("examples/nonmem/xgxr001.mod", package = "NMdata"),
section="EST", newlines=newlines,newfile=NULL)
#>  [1] "$PROBLEM    PK"                                                            
#>  [2] ""                                                                          
#>  [3] ";@ Variables 17/20 @;"                                                     
#>  [4] "$INPUT ROW ID NOMTIME TIME EVID CMT AMT DV FLAG STUDY"                     
#>  [5] "BLQ CYCLE DOSE PART PROFDAY PROFTIME WEIGHTB eff0"                         
#>  [6] ""                                                                          
#>  [7] "$DATA     ../data/xgxr1.csv IGNORE=@ IGNORE=(FLAG.NE.0)"                   
#>  [8] ""                                                                          
#>  [9] "$SUBROUTINE ADVAN4 TRANS4"                                                 
#> [10] ""                                                                          
#> [11] "$PK"                                                                       
#> [12] "TVKA=THETA(1)"                                                             
#> [13] "TVV2=THETA(2)"                                                             
#> [14] "TVCL=THETA(3)"                                                             
#> [15] "TVV3=THETA(4)"                                                             
#> [16] "TVQ=THETA(5)"                                                              
#> [17] "                   "                                                       
#> [18] "KA=TVKA*EXP(ETA(1))"                                                       
#> [19] "V2=TVV2*EXP(ETA(2))"                                                       
#> [20] "CL=TVCL*EXP(ETA(3))"                                                       
#> [21] "V3=TVV3*EXP(ETA(4))"                                                       
#> [22] "Q=TVQ*EXP(ETA(5))"                                                         
#> [23] ""                                                                          
#> [24] "$ERROR"                                                                    
#> [25] "  IPRED=F"                                                                 
#> [26] "  IRES=DV-IPRED"                                                           
#> [27] ""                                                                          
#> [28] "  IF (IPRED.GT.1) THEN"                                                    
#> [29] "    W = SQRT(IPRED**2*SIGMA(1,1)**2 + SIGMA(2,2)**2)"                      
#> [30] "  ELSE"                                                                    
#> [31] "    W=1"                                                                   
#> [32] "  ENDIF"                                                                   
#> [33] ""                                                                          
#> [34] "  IWRES=IRES/W"                                                            
#> [35] "  Y=F+F*ERR(1)+ERR(2)"                                                     
#> [36] ""                                                                          
#> [37] ";-----------------------INITIAL ESTIMATES---------------------------------"
#> [38] "$THETA  (0,0.9)           ; POPKA"                                         
#> [39] "$THETA  (0,4.2)             ; POPCL"                                       
#> [40] "$THETA  (0,3.6)             ; POPV2"                                       
#> [41] "$THETA  (0,5.81)             ; POPV3"                                      
#> [42] "$THETA  (0,3.44)           ; POPQ "                                        
#> [43] ""                                                                          
#> [44] "$OMEGA 0.1"                                                                
#> [45] "$OMEGA 0.1"                                                                
#> [46] "$OMEGA 0.1"                                                                
#> [47] "$OMEGA 0 FIX"                                                              
#> [48] "$OMEGA 0 FIX"                                                              
#> [49] ""                                                                          
#> [50] "$SIGMA .2"                                                                 
#> [51] "$SIGMA .2"                                                                 
#> [52] ""                                                                          
#> [53] "$EST POSTHOC INTERACTION METHOD=1 NOABORT PRINT=5 MAXEVAL=9999 SIG=3"      
#> [54] ""                                                                          
#> [55] "$TABLE ROW   TVKA   TVV2     TVCL  TVV3  TVQ  KA  V2  CL  V3  Q"           
#> [56] "       PRED  IPRED  NOPRINT  FILE=xgxr001_res.txt"
